SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM, a.* FROM ( SELECT SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NAME, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_TEL, MANAGER_EMAIL, SERVICE_IP, PERMISSION_KEY, CAST(CREATE_DATETIME AS CHAR) AS CREATE_DATETIME FROM tb_service_site WHERE 1=1
AND SERVICE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{serviceId}, '%')
AND SERVICE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{serviceName}, '%')
AND MANAGER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{managerName}, '%')
AND SERVICE_IP LIKE CONCAT('%', #{serviceIp}, '%')
AND CREATE_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createDatetime}, '%')
ORDER BY CAST(SERVICE_ID AS DECIMAL) ASC ) a, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) b ) T ORDER BY CAST(SERVICE_ID AS DECIMAL) DESC LIMIT #{searchVO.recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{searchVO.firstIndex}
